entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Flurries beginning overnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 March 2023
